verdict.summary: Granola can pose a gluten risk due to the potential use of gluten-containing grains and cross-contamination during processing. It's important to verify that all ingredients are gluten-free and that there is no cross-contact with gluten sources.

disclaimer: This guidance is informational only. Always verify ingredients and preparation with the restaurant.
